Sentencas: Performance assessment of a novel energy system integrating both biomass gasification and fuel cell systems is performed thermodynamically through energy and exergy efficiencies.
Titulo: Thermal modeling and efficiency assessment of an integrated biomass gasification and solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Steam gasification for rich hydrogen gas production as a useful gasification output is considered.
Titulo: Thermal modeling and efficiency assessment of an integrated biomass gasification and solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Energy and exergy thermodynamics model of the gasification process is introduced.
Titulo: Thermal modeling and efficiency assessment of an integrated biomass gasification and solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: A thermal model of bubbling fluidized bed gasifier, operating at atmospheric pressure, is also considered to investigate the temperature profile through the gasifier.
Titulo: Thermal modeling and efficiency assessment of an integrated biomass gasification and solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Direct internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell model is introduced and it is integrated with the system for power production.
Titulo: Thermal modeling and efficiency assessment of an integrated biomass gasification and solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: The presented models are validated, and the effects of different operating parameters on the system performance are studied under various conditions.
Titulo: Thermal modeling and efficiency assessment of an integrated biomass gasification and solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: Different values of gasification operating temperature and moisture content of the supplied fuel are also considered in parametric studies.
Titulo: Thermal modeling and efficiency assessment of an integrated biomass gasification and solid oxide fuel cell system

Sentencas: The results show that steam biomass ratio has a significant effect on the hydrogen production efficiency and optimal value of 0.677 is calculated for maximum exergy efficiency at the base case condition.
Titulo: Thermal modeling and efficiency assessment of an integrated biomass gasification and solid oxide fuel cell system
